mapper.select: SELECT A.*, DATE_FORMAT(STR_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_START_DT, DATE_FORMAT(END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_END_DT, DATE_FORMAT(END_EXP_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_EXP_END_DT, DATE_FORMAT(END_EXP_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS END_EXP_DT_FORMAT, CASE WHEN A.TM_SN IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS TM_YN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT A WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}

SELECT A.*, (SELECT PNT_PJT_SN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT SP WHERE A.PJT_SN = SP.PNT_PJT_SN limit 1) AS PNT_PJT_SN_CK FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT A LEFT JOIN CAM_CRM.DJ_CRM_INFO B ON A.CRM_SN = B.CRM_SN WHERE 1=1 AND A.TEAM_STAT = "N"
AND A.BUSN_CLASS = #{busnClass}
AND A.PJT_STEP in (${busnSubClass}) AND A.PJT_STOP = "N"
AND A.PJT_STOP = "Y"
AND A.DEPT_SEQ in (${deptSeq})
AND A.REG_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq} AND A.PJT_STEP in ('E1','E2','E3','E4','E5','R2')
AND A.REG_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq}
AND A.PJT_STEP in ('E1','E2','E3','E4','E5','R2')
AND (A.PJT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR A.BS_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR A.PJT_SUB_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%'))
AND A.PJT_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND (A.PJT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR A.PJT_SUB_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%'))
AND B.CRM_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND A.PM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND (A.PJT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pjtNm}, '%') OR A.PJT_SUB_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pjtNm}, '%'))
AND A.BUSN_CLASS IN ('S', 'R') AND A.PJT_CD IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC

SELECT A.*, (SELECT PNT_PJT_SN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT SP WHERE A.PJT_SN = SP.PNT_PJT_SN limit 1) AS PNT_PJT_SN_CK, (select count(*) from cam_mng.dj_depo_setting where fr_pjt_sn = A.pjt_sn) AS setYn FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT A LEFT JOIN CAM_CRM.DJ_CRM_INFO B ON A.CRM_SN = B.CRM_SN WHERE 1=1 AND A.TEAM_STAT = "N" AND A.PJT_STEP in (${busnSubClass})
AND A.BUSN_CLASS = #{busnClass}
AND A.DEPT_SEQ in (${deptSeq})
AND A.REG_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq} AND A.PJT_STEP in ('E1','E2','E3','E4','E5','R2')
AND A.REG_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq}
AND A.PJT_STEP in ('E1','E2','E3','E4','E5','R2')
AND (A.PJT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR A.BS_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR A.PJT_SUB_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%'))
AND A.PJT_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND (A.PJT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR A.PJT_SUB_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%'))
AND B.CRM_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND A.PM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND (A.PJT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pjtNm}, '%') OR A.PJT_SUB_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pjtNm}, '%'))
AND A.BUSN_CLASS IN ('S', 'R') AND A.PJT_CD IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.PJT_SN, A.PJT_CD, A.BUSN_CLASS, A.BUSN_NM, A.PJT_NM, A.PJT_SUB_NM, A.PJT_AMT, DATE_FORMAT(A.STR_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS STR_DT, DATE_FORMAT(A.END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS END_DT, A.PM, A.PJT_STEP, A.PJT_STEP_NM, A.PJT_STOP FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.TEAM_STAT = "N"
UNION ALL
SELECT B.CORP_PJT_SN AS PJT_SN, B.CORP_PJT_CD AS PJT_CD, 'M' AS BUSN_CLASS, '법인' AS BUSN_NM, B.CORP_PJT_NM AS PJT_NM, B.CORP_PJT_SUB_NM, 0 AS PJT_AMT, B.STR_DT AS STR_DT, B.END_DT AS END_DT, B.PM_EMP_NAME AS PM, '' AS PJT_STEP, '' AS PJT_STEP_NM, 'N' AS PJT_STOP FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_CORP_PROJECT B ) RE WHERE RE.PJT_CD IS NOT NULL
AND RE.BUSN_CLASS = #{busnClass}
AND RE.PJT_CD IS NOT NULL
AND (RE.PJT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pjtNm}, '%') OR RE.PJT_SUB_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pjtNm}, '%'))
ORDER BY RE.STR_DT DESC

/*getProjectStep*/ SELECT *, DATE_FORMAT(A.STR_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_STR_DT, DATE_FORMAT(A.END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_END_DT, A.REG_EMP_SEQ AS WRITER_EMP_SEQ FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT A LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_ENGN B ON A.PJT_SN = B.PJT_SN AND B.ACTIVE = "Y" LEFT JOIN CAM_CRM.DJ_CRM_INFO D ON A.CRM_SN = D.CRM_SN LEFT JOIN (SELECT CRM_NM as CRM_CON_NM, CRM_SN as CRM_CON_SN FROM CAM_CRM.DJ_CRM_INFO) DA ON A.CRM_CON_SN = DA.CRM_CON_SN LEFT JOIN (SELECT CRM_NM as CRM_PART_NM, CRM_SN as CRM_PART_SN FROM CAM_CRM.DJ_CRM_INFO) DB ON A.CRM_PART_SN = DB.CRM_PART_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_CRM.DJ_CRM_MEM CM ON D.CRM_SN = CM.CRM_SN AND CM.CRM_MEM_SN = A.CRM_MEM_SN WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
mapper.insert:
/* insProject >> 프로젝트 엔지니어링 최초 등록 */ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT ( PJT_NM, EMP_SEQ, EMP_NAME, DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_NAME, BUSN_CLASS, BUSN_NM, PJT_STEP, PJT_STEP_NM, CONSULT_DT, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{pjtNm}, #{empSeq}, #{empName}, #{deptSeq}, #{deptName}, #{busnClass}, #{busnNm}, #{pjtStep}, #{pjtStepNm}, #{contDt}, #{regEmpSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PROJECT'

INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_ENGN ( PJT_SN, CONT_DT, EXP_AMT, CONT_LOC, STEP1, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{PJT_SN}, #{contDt}, #{expAmt}, #{contLoc}, 'R', #{empSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PJT_ENGN'
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, D.*, CM.*, EI.DEPT_NAME, EI.EMP_NAME_KR, EI.POSITION_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(STR_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_START_DT, DATE_FORMAT(END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_END_DT, DATE_FORMAT(END_EXP_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_EXP_END_DT, DATE_FORMAT(END_EXP_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS END_EXP_DT_FORMAT, CASE WHEN A.TM_SN IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS TM_YN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT A /*LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_ENGN B ON A.PJT_SN = B.PJT_SN*/ LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DELV DE ON A.PJT_SN = DE.PJT_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO EI ON DE.PM_EMP_SEQ = EI.EMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN CAM_CRM.DJ_CRM_INFO D ON A.CRM_SN = D.CRM_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_CRM.DJ_CRM_MEM CM ON A.CRM_MEM_SN = CM.CRM_MEM_SN WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_EST ( PJT_SN, EST_DE, EST_NM, CRM_NM, CRM_MEM, VAT, EST_TOT_AMT, EST_ISS, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{pjtSn}, #{estDe}, #{estNm}, #{crmNm}, #{crmMem}, #{vat}, #{estTotAmt}, #{estIss}, #{regEmpSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PJT_EST'
INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_EST_SUB ( EST_SN, PROD_NM, PROD_CNT, UNIT, UNIT_AMT, SUP_AMT, ETC ) VALUES ( #{estSn}, #{prodNm}, #{prodCnt}, #{unit}, #{unitAmt}, #{supAmt}, #{etc} )
mapper.update: UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT SET PJT_STEP = #{pjtStep}, PJT_STEP_NM = #{pjtStepNm} WHERE PJT_SN = (SELECT PJT_SN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV WHERE DEV_SN = #{devSn})
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, (SELECT EMP_NAME_KR from CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = 1) AS EMP_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_EST_SUB WHERE EST_SN = A.EST_SN) AS CNT, (SELECT SUM(SUP_AMT) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_EST_SUB WHERE EST_SN = A.EST_SN) AS SUM_AMT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_EST A WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_EST_SUB WHERE EST_SN = #{estSn}
SELECT A.*, (SELECT EMP_NAME_KR from CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = 1) AS EMP_NAME FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_EST A WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} ORDER BY EST_SN DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DELV ( PJT_SN, DELV_DE, DELV_SUMR, DELV_SPEC, DELV_ITEM, DELV_CNT, DELV_UNIT, DELV_LOC, DELV_MEAN, DELV_ASSU, DELV_TEST, DELV_AMT, DELV_DEPT, PM_EMP_SEQ, PM_EMP_NM, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{pjtSn}, #{delvDe}, #{delvSumr}, #{delvSpec}, #{delvItem}, #{delvCnt}, #{delvUnit}, #{delvLoc}, #{delvMean}, #{delvAssu}, #{delvTest}, #{delvAmt}, #{delvDept}, #{pmEmpSeq}, #{pmEmpNm}, #{regEmpSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PJT_DELV'
INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV ( PJT_SN, INV_AMT, DEP_OBJ, ETC, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{pjtSn}, #{invAmt}, #{depObj}, #{etc}, #{regEmpSeq} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PS_FILE WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
mapper.update: UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT SET PJT_AMT = #{delvAmt}, STR_DT = #{estDe}, END_EXP_DT = #{delvDe}, PM = #{pmEmpNm}, PJT_TMP_CD = #{pjtTmpCd} WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} AND PJT_CD IS NOT NULL

SELECT A.*, B.DEPT_NAME, DI.APPRO_KEY, DI.DOC_MENU_CD, A.STATUS AS DELV_STATUS FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DELV A LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO B ON A.PM_EMP_SEQ = B.EMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON A.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} ORDER BY DELV_SN DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_NO = #{DELV_FILE_SN}
SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_NO = #{DEV_FILE_SN}
SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_NO = #{EST_FILE_SN}
SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CD GROUP BY GRP_SN
SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CD WHERE LG_CD IS NOT NULL AND PJT_CD IS NULL
SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CD WHERE GRP_SN = #{grpSn} AND LG_CD is not null AND PJT_CD is null
SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CD WHERE GRP_SN = #{grpSn} AND LG_CD is not null AND LG_CD = #{lgCd} AND PJT_CD is not null
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CD ( GRP_SN, GRP_NM, LG_CD, LG_CD_NM ) VALUES ( #{grpSn}, #{grpNm}, #{lgCode}, #{lgCodeNm} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CD WHERE GRP_SN = #{grpSn} AND LG_CD = #{lgCd} AND PJT_CD IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CD ( GRP_SN, GRP_NM, LG_CD, LG_CD_NM, PJT_CD, PJT_CD_NM ) VALUES ( #{grpSn}, #{grpNm}, #{lgCd}, #{lgCdNm}, #{pjtCd}, #{pjtCdNm} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT WHERE PJT_TMP_CD = #{pjtTmpCd}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_EST WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DELV WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} AND STATUS = 0

/*getDevPjtVerList*/ SELECT *, C.REG_DT AS INV_DT, CASE WHEN A.TM_SN IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS TM_YN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT A LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_EST WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} ORDER BY EST_SN DESC LIMIT 1) B ON A.PJT_SN = B.PJT_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV C ON A.PJT_SN = C.PJT_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO D ON C.REG_EMP_SEQ = D.EMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON C.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
SELECT * FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{PM_EMP_SEQ}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PS ( PJT_SN, DEV_SN, PS_ROW, PS_PREP, PS_PREP_NM, PS_NM, PS_STR_DE, PS_END_DE, PS_EMP_SEQ, PS_EMP_NM, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{pjtSn}, #{devSn}, #{psRow}, #{psPrep}, #{psPrepNm}, #{psNm}, #{psStrDe}, #{psEndDe}, #{psEmpSeq}, #{psEmpNm}, #{regEmpSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PJT_PS'
mapper.select: /*getProcessList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PS WHERE DEV_SN = #{devSn}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_INV ( PJT_SN, DEV_SN, INV_ROW, DIV_CD, DIV_NM, INV_NM, INV_CNT, INV_UNIT, EST_TOT_AMT, EST_OFC, INV_ETC, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{pjtSn}, #{devSn}, #{invRow}, #{divCd}, #{divNm}, #{invNm}, #{invCnt}, #{invUnit}, #{estTotAmt}, #{estOfc}, #{invEtc}, #{regEmpSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PJT_INV'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_INV WHERE DEV_SN = #{devSn}
SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_INV WHERE DEV_SN = (SELECT SPD.DEV_SN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV SPD WHERE SPD.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} ORDER BY SPD.DEV_SN DESC LIMIT 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_INV SET INV_ROW = #{invRow}, DIV_CD = #{divCd}, DIV_NM = #{divNm}, INV_NM = #{invNm}, INV_CNT = #{invCnt}, INV_UNIT = #{invUnit}, EST_TOT_AMT = #{estTotAmt}, EST_OFC = #{estOfc}, INV_ETC = #{invEtc} WHERE INV_SN = #{invSn}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, DI.APPRO_KEY, DI.DOC_MENU_CD FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV A LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON A.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE DEV_SN = #{devSn} ORDER BY DEV_SN DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT MAX(PJT_SN) AS PJT_SN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV WHERE DEV_SN = #{devSn}

SELECT M.*, (SELECT CM_CODE_NM FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_COM_CODE WHERE CM_CODE = M.POSITION_CODE AND CM_GROUP_CODE_ID = 4) AS POSITION_NAME, (SELECT LABOR_AMT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_LABOR WHERE POSITION_CD = M.POSITION_CODE) AS LABOR_AMT, (SELECT TEAM_COST_AMT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_TEAM_COST WHERE DEPT_CD = M.DEPT_SEQ) AS TEAM_COST_AMT FROM (SELECT A.*, C.PREP_A_TIME, C.PREP_B_TIME, C.PREP_C_TIME, C.PREP_D_TIME, C.COST_ETC, C.DOC_ID AS COST_DOC_ID, C.STATUS AS COST_STATUS, B.PS_FILE_SN, B.FILE_ETC1, B.FILE_ETC2, B.FILE_ETC3, B.FILE_ETC4, B.FILE_ETC5, B.FILE_ETC6, (SELECT POSITION_CODE FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = A.PS_EMP_SEQ) AS POSITION_CODE, (SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = A.PS_EMP_SEQ) AS EMP_NM, (SELECT DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = A.PS_EMP_SEQ) AS DEPT_SEQ, DI.APPRO_KEY, DI.DOC_MENU_CD FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PS A LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PS_FILE B ON A.PJT_SN = B.PJT_SN AND A.DEV_SN = B.DEV_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_COST C ON A.PJT_SN = C.PJT_SN LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON C.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} ) M WHERE M.DEV_SN = (SELECT SPD.DEV_SN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV SPD WHERE SPD.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} ORDER BY SPD.DEV_SN DESC LIMIT 1)

/*getResultPsMember*/ SELECT M.*, (SELECT CM_CODE_NM FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_COM_CODE WHERE CM_CODE = M.POSITION_CODE AND CM_GROUP_CODE_ID = 4) AS POSITION_NAME, (SELECT LABOR_AMT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_LABOR WHERE POSITION_CD = M.POSITION_CODE) AS LABOR_AMT, (SELECT TEAM_COST_AMT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_TEAM_COST WHERE DEPT_CD = M.DEPT_SEQ) AS TEAM_COST_AMT FROM ( SELECT A.*, C.PREP_A_TIME, C.PREP_B_TIME, C.PREP_C_TIME, C.PREP_D_TIME, C.COST_ETC, C.DOC_ID AS COST_DOC_ID, C.STATUS AS COST_STATUS, B.PS_FILE_SN, B.FILE_ETC1, B.FILE_ETC2, B.FILE_ETC3, B.FILE_ETC4, B.FILE_ETC5, B.FILE_ETC6, (SELECT POSITION_CODE FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = A.PS_EMP_SEQ) AS POSITION_CODE, (SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = A.PS_EMP_SEQ) AS EMP_NM, (SELECT DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = A.PS_EMP_SEQ) AS DEPT_SEQ, DI.APPRO_KEY, DI.DOC_MENU_CD FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PS A LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PS_FILE B ON A.PJT_SN = B.PJT_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_COST C ON A.PJT_SN = C.PJT_SN LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON C.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} AND A.DEV_SN = (SELECT SPD.DEV_SN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV SPD WHERE SPD.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} ORDER BY SPD.DEV_SN DESC LIMIT 1) ) M GROUP BY PS_EMP_SEQ
/*getPsFile1*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_CD = "engnPsFile1" AND CONTENT_ID = #{psFileSn}
/*getPsFile2*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_CD = "engnPsFile2" AND CONTENT_ID = #{psFileSn}
/*getPsFile3*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_CD = "engnPsFile3" AND CONTENT_ID = #{psFileSn}
/*getPsFile4*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_CD = "engnPsFile4" AND CONTENT_ID = #{psFileSn}
/*getPsFile5*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_CD = "engnPsFile5" AND CONTENT_ID = #{psFileSn}
/*getPsFile6*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_CD = "engnPsFile6" AND CONTENT_ID = #{psFileSn}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} AND DELV_STAT = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_ENGN SET ${stepColumn} = #{stepValue}, ${nextStepColumn} = #{nextStepValue}, MOD_DT = now() WHERE ENGN_SN = #{engnSn} AND ${stepColumn} = 'N'
mapper.select: /*getCrmInfo*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT DP LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_ENGN PE ON DP.PJT_SN = PE.PJT_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_CRM.DJ_CRM_INFO CI ON DP.CRM_SN = CI.CRM_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_CRM.DJ_CRM_MEM DM ON DP.CRM_MEM_SN = DM.CRM_MEM_SN WHERE DP.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_HR_BIZ_REQ_RESULT HR LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_HR_BIZ_REQ HRQ ON HR.HR_BIZ_REQ_ID = HRQ.HR_BIZ_REQ_ID WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DELV ( PJT_SN, DELV_DE, DELV_ISSU, DELV_ITEM,
DELV_CNT,
DELV_UNIT, DELV_LOC, DELV_AMT, DELV_DEPT, PM_EMP_SEQ, PM_EMP_NM, PJT_STR_DT, PJT_END_DT, DELV_PAY, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{pjtSn}, #{delvDe}, #{delvIssu}, #{delvItem},
#{delvCnt},
#{delvUnit}, #{delvLoc}, #{delvAmt}, #{delvDept}, #{pmEmpSeq}, #{pmEmpNm}, #{pjtStrDt}, #{pjtEndDt}, #{delvPay}, #{empSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PJT_DELV'

INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV ( PJT_SN, INV_AMT, DEP_OBJ, ETC, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{pjtSn}, #{invAmt}, #{depObj}, #{etc}, #{regEmpSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PJT_DEV'
mapper.select: /*getDevData*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} ORDER BY DEV_SN DESC LIMIT 1

/*getPsPrepInfo*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PS_FILE WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} AND DEV_SN = (SELECT SPD.DEV_SN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV SPD WHERE SPD.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} ORDER BY SPD.DEV_SN DESC LIMIT 1)
mapper.insert:
/*insPsPrepInfo*/ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PS_FILE ( PJT_SN, DEV_SN, FILE_ETC1, FILE_ETC2, FILE_ETC3, FILE_ETC4, FILE_ETC5, FILE_ETC6 ) VALUES ( #{pjtSn}, (SELECT SPD.DEV_SN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV SPD WHERE SPD.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} ORDER BY SPD.DEV_SN DESC LIMIT 1), #{fileEtc1}, #{fileEtc2}, #{fileEtc3}, #{fileEtc4}, #{fileEtc5}, #{fileEtc6} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PJT_PS_FILE'

/*updPsPrepInfo*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PS_FILE SET FILE_ETC1 = #{fileEtc1}, FILE_ETC2 = #{fileEtc2}, FILE_ETC3 = #{fileEtc3}, FILE_ETC4 = #{fileEtc4}, FILE_ETC5 = #{fileEtc5}, FILE_ETC6 = #{fileEtc6} WHERE PS_FILE_SN = #{psFileSn} AND DEV_SN = (SELECT SPD.DEV_SN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV SPD WHERE SPD.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} ORDER BY SPD.DEV_SN DESC LIMIT 1)
mapper.select: /*getResultInfo*/ SELECT A.*, DI.APPRO_KEY, DI.DOC_MENU_CD FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_RESULT A LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON A.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_RESULT ( PJT_SN, PROTOTYPE, SUP_CONT, RS_ISS, RS_ETC,
DELV_PREP_A,
DELV_PREP_B,
DELV_PREP_C,
INV_PREP_A,
INV_PREP_B,
INV_PREP_C,
PREP_A,
PREP_B,
PREP_C,
RS_STR_DT, RS_END_DT, RS_ACT_EQUIP, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{pjtSn}, #{prototype}, #{supCont}, #{rsIss}, #{rsEtc},
#{delvPrepA},
#{delvPrepB},
#{delvPrepC},
#{invPrepA},
#{invPrepB},
#{invPrepC},
#{prepA},
#{prepB},
#{prepC},
#{rsStrDt}, #{rsEndDt}, #{rsActEquip}, #{empSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PJT_RESULT'

INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_RESULT ( PJT_SN,
DELV_PREP_A,
DELV_PREP_B,
DELV_PREP_C,
DELV_PREP_D,
DELV_PREP_E,
DELV_PREP_F,
INV_PREP_A,
INV_PREP_B,
INV_PREP_C,
INV_PREP_D,
INV_PREP_E,
INV_PREP_F,
PREP_A,
PREP_B,
PREP_C,
PREP_D,
PREP_E,
PREP_F,
REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{pjtSn},
#{delvPrepA},
#{delvPrepB},
#{delvPrepC},
#{delvPrepD},
#{delvPrepE},
#{delvPrepF},
#{invPrepA},
#{invPrepB},
#{invPrepC},
#{invPrepD},
#{invPrepE},
#{invPrepF},
#{prepA},
#{prepB},
#{prepC},
#{prepD},
#{prepE},
#{prepF},
#{empSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PJT_RESULT'
mapper.update: /*updResultInfo*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_RESULT SET PROTOTYPE = #{prototype}, SUP_CONT = #{supCont}, RS_ISS = #{rsIss}, RS_ETC = #{rsEtc}, RS_STR_DT = #{rsStrDt}, RS_END_DT = #{rsEndDt}, RS_ACT_EQUIP = #{rsActEquip}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq} WHERE RS_SN = #{rsSn}

/*setPerformanceInfo*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_RESULT SET
DELV_PREP_A = #{delvPrepA},
DELV_PREP_B = #{delvPrepB},
DELV_PREP_C = #{delvPrepC},
DELV_PREP_D = #{delvPrepD},
DELV_PREP_E = #{delvPrepE},
DELV_PREP_F = #{delvPrepF},
INV_PREP_A = #{invPrepA},
INV_PREP_B = #{invPrepB},
INV_PREP_C = #{invPrepC},
INV_PREP_D = #{invPrepD},
INV_PREP_E = #{invPrepE},
INV_PREP_F = #{invPrepF},
PREP_A = #{prepA},
PREP_B = #{prepB},
PREP_C = #{prepB},
PREP_D = #{prepD},
PREP_E = #{prepE},
PREP_F = #{prepF},
MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq} WHERE RS_SN = #{rsSn}
mapper.select: /*getDesignFile*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_NO = #{DSGN_FILE_SN}
/*getProdFile*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_NO = #{PROD_FILE_SN}
mapper.update: /* setDevFileDocNm */ UPDATE CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO SET DOC_ID = #{docId} WHERE file_no in (${fileNo}) AND file_cd in ('devEstFile', 'devFile')
mapper.insert:
/*insTeamInfo*/ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_TEAM ( PJT_SN, TM_DEPT_SEQ, TM_TEAM_SEQ, TM_PM_SEQ,
TM_CRM_SN,
TM_AMT, TM_BALANCE, TM_EXPT_PROFIT, TM_EXPT_PER, TM_EXPT_COST ) VALUES ( #{pjtSn}, #{tmDeptSeq}, #{tmTeamSeq}, #{tmPMSeq},
#{tmCrmSn},
#{tmAmt}, #{tmBalance}, #{tmExptProfit}, #{tmExptPer}, #{tmExptCost} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PJT_TEAM'
mapper.update: /*updTeamProject*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT SET TM_SN = #{tmSn}, EMP_SEQ = #{tmPMSeq}, EMP_NAME = (SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{tmPMSeq}), DEPT_SEQ = #{tmTeamSeq}, DEPT_NAME = (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = #{tmTeamSeq}) WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
mapper.insert:
/*insTeamProject*/ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT ( EMP_SEQ, EMP_NAME, DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_NAME, BUSN_CLASS, BUSN_NM, TEAM_STAT, PNT_PJT_SN, SBJ_CLASS, SBJ_CHAR, SBJ_DEP, SBJ_DEP_SUB, SBJ_SEP, SBJ_STAT_YN, PJT_CON_YEAR, PJT_CD, PJT_TMP_CD, BS_TITLE, PJT_NM, PJT_SUB_NM, PJT_STEP, PJT_STEP_NM, CRM_SN, CRM_MEM_SN, CRM_MEM_TEMP_NM, CRM_CON_SN, CRM_PART_SN, PM_EMP_SEQ, PM, PJT_AMT, PJT_EXP_AMT, CONSULT_DT, STR_DT, ACTIVE, REG_EMP_SEQ, REG_DT ) (SELECT EMP_SEQ, EMP_NAME, DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_NAME, BUSN_CLASS, BUSN_NM, "Y" AS TEAM_STAT, #{pjtSn} AS PNT_PJT_SN, SBJ_CLASS, SBJ_CHAR, SBJ_DEP, SBJ_DEP_SUB, SBJ_SEP, SBJ_STAT_YN, PJT_CON_YEAR, PJT_CD, PJT_TMP_CD, BS_TITLE, CONCAT("[협업] ", PJT_NM) AS PJT_NM, PJT_SUB_NM, PJT_STEP, PJT_STEP_NM, CRM_SN, CRM_MEM_SN, CRM_MEM_TEMP_NM, CRM_CON_SN, CRM_PART_SN, #{tmPMSeq} AS TM_PM_SEQ, IFNULL((SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{tmPMSeq}), '') AS TM_EMP_NAME, #{tmAmt}, #{tmAmt}, CONSULT_DT, NOW(), ACTIVE, REG_EMP_SEQ, REG_DT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn})
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PROJECT'
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.*, (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.TM_DEPT_SEQ) AS DEPT_NAME, (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.TM_TEAM_SEQ) AS TEAM_NAME, (SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = A.TM_PM_SEQ) AS EMP_NAME, (SELECT CRM_NM FROM CAM_CRM.DJ_CRM_INFO WHERE CRM_SN = A.TM_CRM_SN) AS CRM_NM FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_TEAM A LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT B ON A.PJT_SN = B.PJT_SN WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(-1) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_HR_BIZ_REQ_RESULT WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}) AS COUNT, IFNULL(SUM(REPLACE(TOT_COST, ',', '')), 0) AS BUSTRIP_EXNP_SUM FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_HR_BIZ_REQ_RESULT BRR LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_HR_BIZ_EXNP BE ON BRR.HR_BIZ_REQ_RESULT_ID = BE.HR_BIZ_REQ_RESULT_ID WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} AND BRR.STATUS = '100'

SELECT A.*, (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.TM_DEPT_SEQ) AS DEPT_NAME, (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.TM_TEAM_SEQ) AS TEAM_NAME, (SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = A.TM_PM_SEQ) AS EMP_NAME, (SELECT CRM_NM FROM CAM_CRM.DJ_CRM_INFO WHERE CRM_SN = A.TM_CRM_SN) AS CRM_NM, (SELECT PJT_SN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT WHERE PNT_PJT_SN = A.PJT_SN limit 1) AS PNT_PJT_SN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_TEAM A WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} ORDER BY A.TM_SN DESC LIMIT 1
/*getCostData*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_COST WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
mapper.insert: /*insCostInfo*/ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_COST ( PJT_SN, PREP_A_TIME, PREP_B_TIME, PREP_C_TIME, PREP_D_TIME, COST_ETC, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{pjtSn}, #{prepATime}, #{prepBTime}, #{prepCTime}, #{prepDTime}, #{costEtc}, #{empSeq} )
mapper.update: /*updCostInfo*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_COST SET PREP_A_TIME = #{prepATime}, PREP_B_TIME = #{prepBTime}, PREP_C_TIME = #{prepCTime}, PREP_D_TIME = #{prepDTime}, COST_ETC = #{costEtc}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq} WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.*, IFNULL(DELV.DOC_ID, '') AS DELV_DOC_ID, DELVDI.APPRO_KEY AS DELV_APPRO_KEY, DELVDI.DOC_MENU_CD AS DELV_DOC_MENU_CD,
IFNULL(DELVRND.DOC_ID, '') AS DELV_RND_DOC_ID, DELVRNDDI.APPRO_KEY AS DELV_RND_APPRO_KEY, DELVRNDDI.DOC_MENU_CD AS DELV_RND_DOC_MENU_CD,
IFNULL(DELVUNRND.DOC_ID, '') AS DELV_UNRND_DOC_ID, DELVUNRNDDI.APPRO_KEY AS DELV_UNRND_APPRO_KEY, DELVUNRNDDI.DOC_MENU_CD AS DELV_UNRND_DOC_MENU_CD,
IFNULL(DEV.DOC_ID, '') AS DEV_DOC_ID, DEVDI.APPRO_KEY AS DEV_APPRO_KEY, DEVDI.DOC_MENU_CD AS DEV_DOC_MENU_CD,
IFNULL(RESULT.DOC_ID, '') AS RESULT_DOC_ID, RESULTDI.APPRO_KEY AS RESULT_APPRO_KEY, RESULTDI.DOC_MENU_CD AS RESULT_DOC_MENU_CD,
IFNULL(COST.DOC_ID, '') AS COST_DOC_ID, COSTDI.APPRO_KEY AS COST_APPRO_KEY, COSTDI.DOC_MENU_CD AS COST_DOC_MENU_CD
FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT A LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_ENGN B ON A.PJT_SN = B.PJT_SN AND B.ACTIVE = "Y"
LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DELV DELV ON A.PJT_SN = DELV.PJT_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_RND DELVRND ON A.PJT_SN = DELVRND.PJT_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_UNRND DELVUNRND ON A.PJT_SN = DELVUNRND.PJT_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV DEV ON A.PJT_SN = DEV.PJT_SN AND DEV_SN = (SELECT DEV_SN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV SPD WHERE SPD.PJT_SN = A.PJT_SN AND SPD.STATUS = '100' ORDER BY SPD.DEV_SN DESC LIMIT 1) LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_RESULT RESULT ON A.PJT_SN = RESULT.PJT_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_COST COST ON A.PJT_SN = COST.PJT_SN
LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DELVDI ON DELV.DOC_ID = DELVDI.DOC_ID LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DELVRNDDI ON DELVRND.DOC_ID = DELVRNDDI.DOC_ID LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DELVUNRNDDI ON DELVUNRND.DOC_ID = DELVUNRNDDI.DOC_ID LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DEVDI ON DEV.DOC_ID = DEVDI.DOC_ID LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO RESULTDI ON RESULT.DOC_ID = RESULTDI.DOC_ID LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO COSTDI ON COST.DOC_ID = COSTDI.DOC_ID
WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
mapper.update: /*setPjtTeamApp*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT SET PJT_TEAM_CK = 'Y' WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} OR PJT_SN = (SELECT PNT_PJT_SN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn})
mapper.select: /*getPartRateVer*/ SELECT A.*, B.PJT_NM, DATE_FORMAT(B.STR_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS STR_DT, DATE_FORMAT(B.END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS END_DT, DATE_FORMAT(A.REQ_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REQ_DT, (SELECT LG_CD_NM FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CD WHERE LG_CD = B.SBJ_DEP AND GRP_SN = "SUP_DEP" LIMIT 1) AS SBJ_DEP_NM, (SELECT PJT_CD_NM FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CD WHERE LG_CD = B.SBJ_DEP AND GRP_SN = "SUP_DEP" AND PJT_CD = B.SBJ_DEP_SUB) AS SBJ_DEP_SUB_NM, (SELECT CM_CODE_NM FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_COM_CODE WHERE CM_GROUP_CODE_ID = 37 AND CM_CODE = B.SBJ_CHAR) AS SBJ_CHAR_NM, B.BUSN_NM FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER A LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT B ON A.PJT_SN = B.PJT_SN WHERE PART_RATE_VER_SN = #{partRateVerSn}

/*getPartRateBefVer*/ SELECT A.*, B.PJT_NM, DATE_FORMAT(B.STR_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS STR_DT, DATE_FORMAT(B.END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS END_DT, DATE_FORMAT(A.REQ_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REQ_DT, (SELECT LG_CD_NM FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CD WHERE LG_CD = B.SBJ_DEP AND GRP_SN = "SUP_DEP" LIMIT 1) AS SBJ_DEP_NM, (SELECT PJT_CD_NM FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CD WHERE LG_CD = B.SBJ_DEP AND GRP_SN = "SUP_DEP" AND PJT_CD = B.SBJ_DEP_SUB) AS SBJ_DEP_SUB_NM, (SELECT CM_CODE_NM FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_COM_CODE WHERE CM_GROUP_CODE_ID = 37 AND CM_CODE = B.SBJ_CHAR) AS SBJ_CHAR_NM, B.BUSN_NM FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER A LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT B ON A.PJT_SN = B.PJT_SN WHERE A.PJT_SN = (SELECT PJT_SN AS PART_RATE_VER FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER WHERE PART_RATE_VER_SN = #{partRateVerSn}) AND A.PART_RATE_VER = (SELECT PART_RATE_VER-1 AS PART_RATE_VER FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER WHERE PART_RATE_VER_SN = #{partRateVerSn})

/*getProjectManagerInfo*/ SELECT A.*, B.*, DATE_FORMAT(C.STR_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_STR_DT, DATE_FORMAT(C.END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_END_DT, D.CHNG_SAL, D.PART_DET_STR_DT, D.PART_DET_END_DT, D.PART_EMP_NM, D.PART_EMP_SEQ, D.PAY_RATE, D.ITEM_RATE, D.MON_SAL, D.MON_DIFF, D.TOT_PAY_BUDG, D.TOT_ITEM_BUDG, D.TOT_RATE, D.PAY_TOTAL FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_RND A LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SALARY_MANAGE WHERE (SELECT STR_DT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT WHERE PJT_SN = #{PJT_SN}) BETWEEN DATE(START_DT) AND IFNULL(IF(END_DT = "", null, END_DT), DATE('9999-12-31')) ) B ON A.MNG_EMP_SEQ = B.EMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT C ON A.PJT_SN = C.PJT_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PART_RATE_DET D ON D.PART_RATE_VER_SN = #{PART_RATE_VER_SN} AND D.PART_EMP_SEQ = A.MNG_EMP_SEQ AND D.PJT_SN = #{PJT_SN} WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{PJT_SN} limit 1

/*getProjectUnRndManagerInfo*/ SELECT A.*, B.*, DATE_FORMAT(C.STR_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_STR_DT, DATE_FORMAT(C.END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_END_DT, D.CHNG_SAL, D.PART_DET_STR_DT, D.PART_DET_END_DT, D.PART_EMP_NM, D.PART_EMP_SEQ, D.PAY_RATE, D.ITEM_RATE, D.MON_SAL, D.MON_DIFF, D.TOT_PAY_BUDG, D.TOT_ITEM_BUDG, D.TOT_RATE, D.PAY_TOTAL FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_UNRND A LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SALARY_MANAGE WHERE (SELECT STR_DT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT WHERE PJT_SN = #{PJT_SN}) BETWEEN DATE(START_DT) AND IFNULL(IF(END_DT = "", null, END_DT), DATE('9999-12-31')) ) B ON A.MNG_EMP_SEQ = B.EMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT C ON A.PJT_SN = C.PJT_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PART_RATE_DET D ON D.PART_RATE_VER_SN = #{PART_RATE_VER_SN} AND D.PART_EMP_SEQ = A.MNG_EMP_SEQ AND D.PJT_SN = #{PJT_SN} WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{PJT_SN} limit 1

/*getProjectMemberInfo*/ SELECT A.*, B.*, DATE_FORMAT(C.STR_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_STR_DT, DATE_FORMAT(C.END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_END_DT, D.CHNG_SAL, D.PART_DET_STR_DT, D.PART_DET_END_DT, D.PART_EMP_NM, D.PART_EMP_SEQ, D.PAY_RATE, D.ITEM_RATE, D.MON_SAL, D.MON_DIFF, D.TOT_PAY_BUDG, D.TOT_ITEM_BUDG, D.TOT_RATE, D.PAY_TOTAL, D.GUBUN, D.PART_RATE_DET FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER A LEFT JOIN (SELECT SM.*, RS.NATIONAL_PENSION, RS.LIMIT_AMT, RS.HEALTH_INSURANCE, RS.LONG_CARE_INSURANCE, RS.EMPLOY_INSURANCE, RS.ACCIDENT_INSURANCE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SALARY_MANAGE SM JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SOCIAL_RATE RS ON SM.SOCIAL_RATE_SN = RS.SOCIAL_RATE_SN WHERE (SELECT STR_DT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT WHERE PJT_SN = #{PJT_SN}) BETWEEN DATE(START_DT) AND IFNULL(IF(END_DT = "", null, END_DT), DATE('9999-12-31')) ) B ON B.EMP_SEQ = #{MEMBER_SEQ} LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT C ON A.PJT_SN = C.PJT_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PART_RATE_DET D ON A.PART_RATE_VER_SN = D.PART_RATE_VER_SN AND D.PART_EMP_SEQ = #{MEMBER_SEQ} AND D.PJT_SN = #{PJT_SN} WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{PJT_SN} AND A.PART_RATE_VER = #{PART_RATE_VER}

/*getProjectMemberTemp*/ SELECT A.*, B.*, DATE_FORMAT(C.STR_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_STR_DT, DATE_FORMAT(C.END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_END_DT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER A LEFT JOIN (SELECT SM.*, RS.NATIONAL_PENSION, RS.LIMIT_AMT, RS.HEALTH_INSURANCE, RS.LONG_CARE_INSURANCE, RS.EMPLOY_INSURANCE, RS.ACCIDENT_INSURANCE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SALARY_MANAGE SM JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SOCIAL_RATE RS ON SM.SOCIAL_RATE_SN = RS.SOCIAL_RATE_SN WHERE (SELECT STR_DT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT WHERE PJT_SN = #{PJT_SN}) BETWEEN DATE(START_DT) AND IFNULL(IF(END_DT = "", null, END_DT), DATE('9999-12-31')) ) B ON B.EMP_SEQ = #{MEMBER_SEQ} LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT C ON A.PJT_SN = C.PJT_SN WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{PJT_SN} AND A.PART_RATE_VER = #{PART_RATE_VER}
mapper.update: /*updEngnProjectCode*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT SET PJT_CD = (SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(REPLACE(PJT_CD, #{PJT_TMP_CD}, '')) = "" THEN CONCAT(#{PJT_TMP_CD}, '01') ELSE CONCAT(#{PJT_TMP_CD}, LPAD(SUBSTR(MAX(PJT_CD), 8) + 1, '2', '0')) END AS tt FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT WHERE PJT_CD like CONCAT(#{PJT_TMP_CD}, '%')), PJT_AMT = (SELECT DELV_AMT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DELV WHERE PJT_SN = #{PJT_SN}), STR_DT = (SELECT PJT_STR_DT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DELV WHERE PJT_SN = #{PJT_SN}), END_DT = (SELECT PJT_END_DT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DELV WHERE PJT_SN = #{PJT_SN}), PM_EMP_SEQ = (SELECT PM_EMP_SEQ FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DELV WHERE PJT_SN = #{PJT_SN}), PM = (SELECT PM_EMP_NM FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DELV WHERE PJT_SN = #{PJT_SN}) WHERE PJT_SN = #{PJT_SN}
mapper.insert: /* insCustomBudget */ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CB ( PJT_SN, CB_CODE_ID_1, CB_CODE_NAME_1, CB_CODE_ID_2, CB_CODE_NAME_2, CB_CODE_ID_3, CB_CODE_NAME_3, CB_BUDGET, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{pjtSn}, #{cbCodeId1}, #{cbCodeName1}, #{cbCodeId2}, #{cbCodeName2}, #{cbCodeId3}, #{cbCodeName3}, #{cbBudget}, #{regEmpSeq} )
mapper.delete: /* delCustomBudget */ DELETE FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CB WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
/*delTeamProject*/ DELETE FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT WHERE TM_SN = #{tmSn} AND PNT_PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
mapper.select: /*getTeamProjectList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT A LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_TEAM B ON A.PNT_PJT_SN = B.PJT_SN WHERE A.PNT_PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}

/*partRateEmpInfo*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ IN
#{item}
mapper.update: /*confirmPartRate*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER SET MNG_STAT = 'C', BEF_VER_CHECK = 'Y', CONF_DATE = now() WHERE PART_RATE_VER_SN = #{partRateVerSn}
mapper.insert: /*insPartRateMonth*/ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PART_RATE_MON ( PJT_SN, BS_YEAR, EMP_SEQ, BS_SAL, MON_SAL, MON_PAY_01, MON_PAY_02, MON_PAY_03, MON_PAY_04, MON_PAY_05, MON_PAY_06, MON_PAY_07, MON_PAY_08, MON_PAY_09, MON_PAY_10, MON_PAY_11, MON_PAY_12, MON_ITEM_01, MON_ITEM_02, MON_ITEM_03, MON_ITEM_04, MON_ITEM_05, MON_ITEM_06, MON_ITEM_07, MON_ITEM_08, MON_ITEM_09, MON_ITEM_10, MON_ITEM_11, MON_ITEM_12 ) VALUES ( #{PJT_SN}, #{BS_YEAR}, #{EMP_SEQ}, #{BS_SAL}, #{MON_SAL}, #{MON_PAY_01}, #{MON_PAY_02}, #{MON_PAY_03}, #{MON_PAY_04}, #{MON_PAY_05}, #{MON_PAY_06}, #{MON_PAY_07}, #{MON_PAY_08}, #{MON_PAY_09}, #{MON_PAY_10}, #{MON_PAY_11}, #{MON_PAY_12}, #{MON_ITEM_01}, #{MON_ITEM_02}, #{MON_ITEM_03}, #{MON_ITEM_04}, #{MON_ITEM_05}, #{MON_ITEM_06}, #{MON_ITEM_07}, #{MON_ITEM_08}, #{MON_ITEM_09}, #{MON_ITEM_10}, #{MON_ITEM_11}, #{MON_ITEM_12} )
mapper.update: /*updJoinMember*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER SET JOIN_MEM_SN = CONCAT(IF(JOIN_MEM_SN = "", "", CONCAT(JOIN_MEM_SN, ",")), #{joinMemSn}), JOIN_MEM_NM = CONCAT(IF(JOIN_MEM_NM = "", "", CONCAT(JOIN_MEM_NM, ",")), #{joinMem}) WHERE PART_RATE_VER_SN = #{partRateVerSn}
mapper.select: /*getProjectByPjtCd*/ SELECT *, DATE_FORMAT(STR_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_START_DT, DATE_FORMAT(END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_END_DT, DATE_FORMAT(END_EXP_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_EXP_END_DT, DATE_FORMAT(END_EXP_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS END_EXP_DT_FORMAT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT WHERE PJT_CD = #{pjtCd} AND TEAM_STAT = 'N';
/*getDepositList*/ SELECT A.*, B.PJT_NM, B.DOC_ID, B.DOC_STATUS, B.PAY_EXNP_DE FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_DEPO A LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP B ON A.PAY_INCP_SN = B.PAY_INCP_SN WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
/*getProjectCodeData*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} limit 1
/*getDevMap*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV WHERE STATUS = 100 AND PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} ORDER BY DEV_SN DESC LIMIT 1
